data.name: Plumber 2
data.detailed_description:
The Plumber 2 is a popular logical game, whose goal is to connect two water points in a short time to drain the water. This game has 30 levels with a gradually increasing degree of complexity, and the game is ideally suited for mobile devices.
Challenge yourself. How quickly can you complete all the levels?
Earn stars and complete more levels.


- PC controls: Mouse.
- pleasant music
- cute graphics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
